name: The Language of Love - OST
detailed_description:
Soundtrack for ebi-hime's The Language of Love, composed by yuzuki.

Includes 10 tracks in MP3 and OGG.

01 - Ai no Katachi
02 - Lost
03 - Tokyo Streets
04 - Magical Fist!
05 - Country Boy
06 - Petit Jardin
07 - English Lessons
08 - Cherry Blossoms
09 - Language of Love
10 - Mirai
